alert_on_save_default.error: An error occurred in the process

btn_backup_profile.description: Create a backup copy of your profile
btn_backup_profile.label: Backup Profile

modal.description: Create a backup copy, remember to enter the destination
modal.title: Backup Profile

btn_clone_profile.description: Clone your profile to a new one
btn_clone_profile.label: Clone Profile

modal.description: Enter the name of the profile you want to clone. This will create a new profile with the same settings as the selected profile.

input_new_name.label: New Profile Name
input_new_name.placeholder: Enter the new name for your profile

modal.title: Clone Profile

modal.description: Select the profile to which you want to copy the settings, remember that your settings will be replaced, we recommend that you make a backup copy of your profile.
modal.title: Copy Config

modal.description: You can rename the profile, but it must be less than 20 characters.

input_new_name.label: Profile name
input_new_name.placeholder: Enter the new name for your profile

modal.title: Rename profile

profile_error.description: Remember to disable Steam Cloud from your profile or verify the location of your "Documents" folder
profile_error.title: Profiles not found

about.description: This is an open source application created in order to help ETS 2 & ATS players to edit their Game Save in a simple and easy way for those who do not want to edit these codes manually.

modal.description: Enter the amount of experience you want to add to your profile

input_experience.label: Experience
input_experience.placeholder: Enter the amount of experience in numbers

modal.title: Change experience

modal.description: Add the amount of money you want in your profile

input_money.label: Money
input_money.placeholder: Enter the amount of money in EUR

modal.title: Change money

dealer_visited.description_card: Set all dealer status to your profile

modal.description: Select the status of all the dealers in your profile
modal.title: Discover all dealers

garage_status.description_card: Set any garages status to your profile

modal.description: Select the status of the garage you want to apply to your profile
modal.title: Buy all garages

skills_points.description_card: Set experience skills to your profile

modal.description: Enter the amount of experience you need
modal.title: Set Experience Skills

visited_cities.description_card: Set any city visited status to your profile

modal.description: Select the status of all cities visited
modal.title: Discover all cities

settings.document_dialog_title: Select the folder where your progre is stored
settings.title: Settings

license_plate.description_card: Change the license plate of the trailer

modal.description: Enter the new license plate of the trailer
modal.title: Change trailer license plate

modify_job_weight.description_card: Modify the weight of the job

modal.description: This will modify the weight of your current job to the one you define here. Remember that you will need to have an active job anchored to your truck
modal.title: Change load weight

modify_trailer_weight.description_card: Modifies the trailer weight, applying it only once

modal.description: This modifies the weight of your trailer in 2 parameters. Usually the chassis_mass is used but you can also edit the body_mass (default body_mass is 0)

input_body_mass.label: Body Mass in kg
input_body_mass.placeholder: Enter the body mass in kg

input_chassis_mass.label: Chassis Mass in kg
input_chassis_mass.placeholder: Enter the chassis mass in kg

modal.title: Change trailer weight

repair_all_trailer.description_card: Repair all the trailers you have

modal.description: Repairs all the trailers you own
modal.title: Repair all trailers

modal.description: Repairs the trailer that is currently attached to the trailer
modal.title: Repair trailers

modal.description: Unlock your trailer in all countries if it is blocked by the game
modal.title: Unlock Current Trailer

warning_message.message: You must have the trailer hitched to the truck for the changes to take effect.
warning_message.title: Remember

change_trailer.description_card: Change your trailer without going to the garage

modal.description: Change your trailer without going to the garage
modal.title: Change your trailer on the road

warning_message.title: Warning
warning_message.message: If you created a new save, remember to update the list of trailers so you don't get an error when changing trailers.

modal.description: Change the engine of your truck to the one of your choice

warning_message.message: If you see any logo floating or badly positioned on the truck you can remove it with the button below.

warning_message.message: If you see any logo floating or badly positioned on the truck you can remove it with the button below.

modal.description: This option will allow you to refuel all your purchased trucks
modal.title: Fill all trucks fuel

modal.description: Refuels your truck completely
modal.title: Fill fuel

modal.description: Exactly the fuel is not infinite but it is for approximately 5.000.000 KM (depending on the truck)
modal.title: Infinite fuel on current truck

warning_message.message: Disable “Realistic fuel consumption” in your “Gameplay” section for this function to take effect.
warning_message.title: Remember
